mapper.select: select u.id, u.account, u.name, u.restaurant_id as restaurantId, u.role_id as roleId, u.password, u.phone from user u where account = #{account}
select u.id, u.account, u.name, u.restaurant_id as restaurantId, u.role_id as roleId, u.password, u.phone from user u where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (account, name, password, restaurant_id, role_id, phone) SELECT #{account}, #{name}, #{password}, #{restaurantId} , #{roleId}, #{phone} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT account FROM user WHERE account = #{account})
